Html:
I have just started using HAP and find it very useful. I am having trouble getting the html for a multi-frame page returned by google translate service. The html returned is from the first frame containing the frameset tag. I cant get HAP to get the html for the frame containing the translation itself. Using the link from the frame's src attribute again load a multi-frame page and the html returned is again the first frame. Any ideas?

Thanks.

you have to use this URL that bypass the "Instant search" request.
http://www.google.com/search?num=39&q=query

let me know if that work out for you.

-V
Thanks for the reply. I changed my code sometime ago to use the Google Translate API to work directly with the foreign language page which was single frame page.
